parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Host
parameter.description: Host name or IP address of the ZoneMinder server.

parameter.name: useSSL
parameter.label: Use Secure Connection
parameter.description: Use HTTP or HTTPS for connection to ZoneMinder. Default is HTTP.

parameter.name: portNumber
parameter.label: Port Number
parameter.description: Port number if not on ZoneMinder default port 80.

parameter.name: urlPath
parameter.label: URL Path
parameter.description: Path where ZoneMinder is installed. Default is /zm. Enter / if ZoneMinder is installed under the root directory.

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Frequency in seconds at which monitor status will be updated.

parameter.name: defaultAlarmDuration
parameter.label: Default Alarm Duration
parameter.description: Sets the default alarm duration for discovered monitors (in seconds).

parameter.name: defaultImageRefreshInterval
parameter.label: Default Image Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Sets the image refresh interval in seconds for discovered monitors. Leave empty to not set an image refresh interval.

parameter.name: discoveryEnabled
parameter.label: Background Discovery Enabled
parameter.description: Enable or disable the automatic discovery of monitors. Default is enabled.

parameter.name: user
parameter.label: User ID
parameter.description: User ID of the ZoneMinder user when using authentication.

parameter.name: pass
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Password of the ZoneMinder user when using authentication.

parameter.name: monitorId
parameter.label: Monitor ID
parameter.description: ID of monitor defined in ZoneMinder.

parameter.name: imageRefreshInterval
parameter.label: Image Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Interval in seconds at which the snapshot image channel will be updated.

parameter.name: alarmDuration
parameter.label: Alarm Duration
parameter.description: Duration the alarm will run once triggered by the triggerAlarm channel.
